Package manager

Class EntityManager

java.lang.Object
manager.EntityManager
public class EntityManager extends Object
The EntityManager class manages entities within a game map, handling their addition, removal, movement, and interactions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EntityManager(int gridWidth, int gridHeight, CoordinatesLoader coordinatesLoader, SceneManager sceneManager)
    Constructs an EntityManager with specified grid dimensions and a scene manager.

  • Constructor Details

    • EntityManager

      public EntityManager(int gridWidth, int gridHeight, CoordinatesLoader coordinatesLoader, SceneManager sceneManager)
      Constructs an EntityManager with specified grid dimensions and a scene manager.
      Parameters:
      gridWidth - The width of the grid.
      gridHeight - The height of the grid.
      coordinatesLoader - The coordinates loader for translating locations.
      sceneManager - The scene manager for handling scene changes.

      Gets an entity at a specified location.
      Parameters:
      location - The location to check.
      Returns:

    • getEntities

      public Collection<Entity> getEntities()
      Gets all entities managed by the entity manager.
      Returns:
      A collection of all entities.

    • getDirectionEntity

      public Entity getDirectionEntity(LivingEntity entity, Direction direction)
      Gets the entity in the specified direction from a given entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - The reference entity.
      direction - The direction to check.
      Returns:
      The entity in the specified direction, or null if no entity exists there.

      Parameters:

      direction - The direction of the NPC.

    • lootEntity

      public void lootEntity(LivingEntity entity, LivingEntity lootedEntity)
      Transfers all items from a looted entity to the looting entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity performing the looting.
      lootedEntity - The entity being looted.

    • hitEntity

      public void hitEntity(LivingEntity entity, Direction direction)
      Hits an entity in a specified direction, reducing its health and possibly removing it if it dies.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity performing the hit.
      direction - The direction of the target entity.

    • useItem

      public void useItem(LivingEntity entity, Direction direction)

      Parameters:

      direction - The direction to use the item.

      Parameters:

    • getNewLocation

      public Point2D getNewLocation(Point2D location, Direction direction)
      Gets the new location based on the current location and direction.
      Parameters:
      location - The current location.
      direction - The direction to move.
      Returns:
      The new location after moving in the specified direction.

    • canMoveTo

      public boolean canMoveTo(LivingEntity entity, Point2D location)
      Checks if an entity can move to a specified location.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity attempting to move.
      location - The location to move to.
      Returns:
      True if the entity can move to the location, otherwise false.
